Text: Only 1.64GB? Can somebody confirm that this includes everything? Thanks.

so im running 10.6.8 and i cant seem to get this to install. i keep getting an unknown error message when i get to the install page, same thing happened when i tried to install 3.6.2.... any help is much appreciated

I got past the 'installation failed' error by changing the computer's date to 1/10/2011,   untick 'set date and time automatically' first.  The signature on the software expires at a certain date.
Minimum OSX version needed is 10.6.7

@n1kn7h what is your version? did it work on 10.6.8? I also saw the issue with the date somewhere else and had already tried it. Although it begins the installation, it will be stopped later with another "Installation Failed" message.
